ECStructClass.description: 2D location on the profile used to place and offset profiles when extruding them on curve members.

ECProperty.description: Name of the cardinal point, used to reference and distinquish cardinal points. Unique in the scope of a profile.
2D offset from the start of profiles coordinate system (0, 0) defining the location for the cardinal point.

ECEntityClass.description: A resource defining one or more 2D areas that may have voids.

ECProperty.description: Name of the profile. This property is also used as designation when referencing a profile from standard catalog.
2D geometry of the profile.

ECStructArrayProperty.description: Array of published and custom (user defined) cardinal points of the profile.

ECEntityClass.description: A Profile with a single outer perimiter.
A SinglePerimeterProfile that is guaranteed to have the center of the bounding box at (0, 0).
A C shaped Profile similar to rolled steel C-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the flange, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the web, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Constant wall thickness of flanges.
Constant wall thickness of the web.
The fillet radius between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of the lower edges of the top flange and the upper edges of the bottom flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower face of the top flange and of the upper face of the bottom flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flanges, 0 in case of parallel flanges, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: An I shaped Profile similar to rolled steel I-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the width (flange length), defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the depth (web length), defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Flange thickness of the I-shape. Both, the upper and the lower flanges have the same thickness and they are centred on the y-axis of the position coordinate system.
Web thickness of the I-shape. The web is centred on the x-axis and the y-axis of the position coordinate system.
The fillet radius between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of the lower edges of the top flange and the upper edges of the bottom flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower faces of the top flange and of the upper faces of the bottom flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flanges, 0 in case of parallel flanges, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: A T-shaped Profile similar to rolled steel T-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the width (top flange), defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the depth (web length), defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Constant wall thickness of the flange.
Constant wall thickness of the web.
The fillet radius between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of flange edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower face of the flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flange, 0 in case of non-tapered flange, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of web edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the web. Non-zero in case of tapered web, 0 in case of non-tapered web, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: An L-shaped Profile (also refered as Angle) similar to rolled steel L-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Horizontal leg length, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Vertical leg length, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Constant wall thickness of profile.
Fillet radius between legs. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of flange edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the inner faces of the legs. Non-zero in case of tapered legs, 0 in case of perpendicular legs, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: A TT-shaped Profile similar to double-tee concrete shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the width (top flange), defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the depth (web length), defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Constant wall thickness of the flange.
Constant wall thickness of the web.
Spacing between the two webs.
The fillet radius between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of flange edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower face of the flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flange, 0 in case of non-tapered flange, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of web edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the web. Non-zero in case of tapered web, 0 in case of non-tapered web, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: An L-shaped Profile (also refered as Angle) with legs bent at 15 degree angle, making the angle between the legs equal to 60 degrees.

ECProperty.description: Leg length. Both vertical and horizontal legs are defined wiht equal length.
Constant wall thickness of profile.

Offset defining where legs are bent. Offset is measured from start of the angle (leg joint) plus leg thickness i.e. if LegBendOffset is zero, legs will be bent at distance equal to Thickness from the leg joint.
Fillet radius between legs. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of flange edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: A Z-shaped Profile similar to rolled steel Z-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of single flange, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the depth (web length), defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Constant wall thickness of flanges.
Constant wall thickness of the web.
The fillet radius between the web and the flanges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of flange edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower face of the top flange and of the upper face of the bottom flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flanges, 0 in case of parallel flanges, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: This class represents a SinglePerimeterProfile that has been converted into a different shape via a matrix transform. Usage outside of IFC compatability is not recommended

ECProperty.description: 2D vector specifying how the profiles geometry will be offseted from it's original coordinates.
A non-uniform scale factor.
Angle by which the profiles geometry will be rotated.
Flag indicating whether the profiles geometry should be mirrored around the Y axis.
Non self intersecting centerline defining the geometry of the Profile.
Constant thickness that is applied evenly along the Centerline.

ECEntityClass.description: A C shaped Profile with rounded corners, similar to cold-formed steel C-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the flange, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the web, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Inner fillet radius.
Length of lips. 0 if profile doesn't have lips, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: An L-shaped Profile with rounded corners, similar to cold-formed steel L-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Horizontal leg length, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Vertical leg length, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Inner fillet radius.
Length of lips. 0 if profile doesn't have lips, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: A Z-shaped Profile with rounded corners, similar to cold-formed steel Z-shapes

ECProperty.description: Extent of single flange, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the depth (web length), defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Inner fillet radius.
Length of lips. 0 if profile doesn't have lips, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: Profile of a plate that has been bent at a given point with a given angle.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the plate length, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Inner angle of the bend point. Value is valid in range (0..180) degrees. Values near 180 degrees meaning an almost unbent plate and values near 0 are almost fully bent in half plate.
Offset from the left edge of the plate defining at what point the plate is bent.
Inner fillet radius of the bend point.

ECEntityClass.description: A Profile comprised of multiple SinglePerimeterProfiles.
A Profile comprised of multiple SinglePerimeterProfiles.
Aspect used by ArbitraryCompostiteProfile to reference SinglePerimeterProfile and store geometry transformations for it.

ECProperty.description: 2D vector specifying how the profiles geometry will be offseted from it's original coordinates.
Angle by which the profiles geometry will be rotated.
Flag indicating whether the profiles geometry should be mirrored around the Y axis.
Index used to strictly order components. This property is a duplicate from bis:ElementGroupsMembers.

ECEntityClass.description: A CompositeProfile comprised of back-to-back Ls with the horizontal legs at the top of the Profile.

ECProperty.description: Distance separating the individual back to back LShapeProfiles.
Enumeration defining which legs are to be placed back to back.

ECEntityClass.description: A CompositeProfile comprised of back-to-back Cs.

ECProperty.description: Distance separating the individual back to back CShapeProfiles.

ECEntityClass.description: Solid ellipse shape Profile.

ECProperty.description: The first radius of the ellipse. It is measured along the direction of x axis of the position coordinate system.
The second radius of the ellipse. It is measured along the direction of y axis of the position coordinate system.

ECEntityClass.description: Solid circle shape Profile.

ECProperty.description: The radius of the circle.

ECEntityClass.description: Hollow circle shape Profile.

ECProperty.description: The radius of the circle.
Constant thickness of profile walls.

ECEntityClass.description: Solid rectangle shape Profile.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the x-axis.
Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the y-axis.

ECEntityClass.description: Solid rectangle shape Profile with rounded corners.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the x-axis.
Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the y-axis.
Radius of the circular arcs by which all four corners of the rectangle are equally rounded.

ECEntityClass.description: Hollow rectangle shape Profile.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the x-axis.
Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the y-axis.
Constant thickness of profile walls.
Radius of the circular arcs, by which all four corners of the inner contour of rectangle are equally rounded. Default 0 (= no rounding arcs) if not specified.
Radius of the circular arcs, by which all four corners of the outer contour of rectangle are equally rounded. Default 0 (= no rounding arcs) if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: Trapezoid shape Profile.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the top line measured along the implicit x-axis.
Extent of the bottom line measured along the implicit x-axis.
Extent of the distance between the parallel bottom and top lines measured along the implicit y-axis.
Offset from the beginning of the top line to the bottom line, measured along the implicit x-axis.

ECEntityClass.description: Polygon shape Profile, where all angles and sides of the polygon are equal.

ECProperty.description: Count of sides (edges) the polygon is made of. Value cannot be less than 3 or greater than 32.
Constant length of each polygon side (edge).

ECEntityClass.description: Capsule shape Profile - cylinder with hemispherical ends. Also refered as stadium shape.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the capsule in the direction of the x-axis.
Extent of the capsule in the direction of the y-axis.

ECEnumerator.description: MaterialProfile that has load bearing function.

ECEntityClass.description: Material Profile Definition.

ECProperty.description: Name of the MaterialProfile used for identification.
Description of the MaterialProfile.

ECEntityClass.description: Material Profile

ECProperty.description: Index used by MaterialProfileSet to ensure a string ordering of the MaterialProfiles.
Role of the MaterialProfile.
